metadata.synopsis: The player found and read the letter written by Melodia, wife of Ketheric (string name: MOO_KethericsChambers_NoteFromWife). It is found in Ketherics room under a loose floor board. Reading this letter opens the option to have Ketheric stand down during the colony fight (he still dies). The VB helps support the notion that this letter is significant.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to Ketheric's roomAttack, roll a succesful perception check, or attack the loose floor boardOpen the container and read the letter (will trigger once the book UI closes)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A letter from Ketheric's wife. Sounds like she loved him very much.
